trans-unit.source: Provides qualifying information to a callback method when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged"></xref> event occurs.
An <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.ApplicationChanged> event is raised when:
A peer starts an application within a collaboration
A peer ends an application within a collaboration
The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> object that represents a collaborating peer has a change in its properties, such as the associated Nickname
The scope of the application is changed on that peer contact's computer
A peer moves to a different IP address on the network
Every class that uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs> class requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of Unrestricted.
This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> object is constructed.
Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> for which the event was raised.
Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance that was updated.
Gets the type of change to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> that occurred.
Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.

The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the type of change that was performed on the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
Gets the endpoint for which <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> information has changed.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> that contains the endpoint for which application information has changed.
Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type `int`.
